description:
Keroro`s mother receives a letter from him that wildly exaggerates how close they are to finishing invading, so she shows up on Earth to "help."  Then, on Mothers` Day, Aki decides to join the Keroro Platoon and become an invader for the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Invasion Achievement in the Next Day / Aki, Becoming An Invader
ケロロ 侵略達成翌日 / 秋 侵略者になる
